phrs.translation: 毛叶番荔枝, 番荔枝, 南美番荔枝, 冷子番荔枝

sentences.sentence: He was talking about the cherimoya.
Mark Twain called it “the most delicious fruit known to men.” He was talking about the cherimoya.
sentences.translation: 马克吐温所说的“人类所知的最鲜美的水果”，指的是番荔枝。
